Judul: INCREASING MANAGER CONTRIBUTION IN INOVATION THROUGH KM TOOLS OF E- KAIZEN IN PT. INDONESIA EPSON INDUSTRY
Abstrak:
Knowledge Management became the important factor of a developing organization and always wanted to achieve the competitive superiority to win in printer business tight  
 

competition in the world. KM will be developing when the company had the learning culture organization and had knowledge worker that become an agent in the implementation of KM activity. The question that often emerged in the implementation KM is the lack commitment of the company and the low level of the awareness of the  
 

employee in carrying out the KM. activity as well as the mistake in implementation of using KM procedure.   
 

The data collection that done by using the survey method through the interview to PT. Indonesia Epson Industry Manager had a purpose to see the motivation of the Managers in did innovasion through KM tools E Kaizen. Moreover was carry out, also the gap analysis between management of PT. Indonesia Epson Industry expectation against the Manager against Manager's contribution in creating innovation. The research was also done to see Manager's motivation to carry out the culture of knowledge share and the use of facilities that were available in did innovasion The research showed that respondent has high awareness to do innovation through E  
 

kaizen KM media and sharing knowledge to the other Manager but was hindered by the limitations of time and procedure of the creating and reporting the E Kaizen activity that considered still complicated and need much time to do. The respondent also realised that sharing knowledge is very important in an organisation. Moreover, its still lack of managing knowledge which captured in creating knowledge into the media that can be access by the all of employee to be share knowledge
